GK19dandkc_u:2478: amutrāsanyavanāḥ te māmuddhṛtya rāmeṣunāmre nāvikānāyakāya kathitavantaḥ-“ko 'ṣyayamāyasanigalabaddha eva jale labdhaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2487: amī tathākurvan sarvāṃśca tānpratibhaṭānbhallavarṣiṇā bhīmaṭaṅkṛtena śārṅgeṇa lavalavīkṛtāṅgānakārṣam /
GK19dandkc_u:2492: te tu sāṃyātrikā madīyenaiva śṛṅkhalena tamatigāḍhaṃ baddhvā harṣikalakilāravamakurvanmāṃ cāpūjayan /
GK19dandkc_u:2493: durvārā tu sā naurananukūlavātanunnā dūramabhipatya kamapi dvīpaṃ nibiḍhamāśliṣṭavatī /

GK19dandkc_u:2517: - “kiṃ krūraṃ strīhṛdayaṃ kiṃ gṛhiṇaḥ priyahitāya dāraguṇāḥ /

GK19dandkc_u:2539: jyeṣṭhamadhyamabhārye ca krameṇa bhayitvā “kaniṣṭhabhāryā dhūminā śvo bhakṣaṇīyā' iti samakalpayan /
GK19dandkc_u:2540: atha kaniṣṭho dhanyakaḥ priyāṃ svāmattumakṣamastayā saha tasyāmeva niśyapāsarat /

GK19dandkc_u:2545: puṣṭaṃ ca tamudriktadhātumekadāmṛgānveṣaṇāya ca prayāte dhanyake sā dhūminī riraṃsayopātiṣṭhata /
GK19dandkc_u:2548: rujāti me śiraḥ śirorogaḥ' ityudañcanaṃ sarajjuṃ puraścikṣepa /
GK19dandkc_u:2551: taṃ ca vikalaṃ skandhenoduhya deśāddeśāntaraṃ paribhramantī pativratāpratītiṃ lebhe,
GK19dandkc_u:2555: sā dhūminī yena me patirvikalīkṛtaḥ sa durātmāyam' iti tasya sādhościtravadhamajñena
GK19dandkc_u:2557: dhanyakastu dattapaścādbando badhyabhūmiṃ nīyamānaḥ saśeṣatvādāyuṣaḥ “yo mayā vikalīkṛto 'bhimato bhikṣuḥ,
GK19dandkc_u:2560: “ko doṣaḥ' ityupanīya darśite 'muṣminsa vikalaḥ paryaśruḥ pādapatitastatasya sādostatsukṛtamasatyāśca tasyāstathābhūtaṃ duścaritamāryabuddhirācacakṣe
GK19dandkc_u:2561: kupitena rājñā virūpitamukhī sā duṣkṛtakārimī kṛtā śvabhyaḥ pācikā /

GK19dandkc_u:2567: atha varapratyayāhṛteṣu dāreṣu yādṛcchikīṃ saṃpattimanabhisamīkṣya kārtāntiko nāma bhūtvā vastrāntapinaddhaśāliprastho bhuvaṃ babhrāma /
GK19dandkc_u:2569: yāṃ kācillakṣaṇavatīṃ savarṇāṃ kanyāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa kila sma bravīti-“bhadre,
GK19dandkc_u:2572: ekadā tu śibiṣu paṭṭane saha pitṛbyāmavasitamahardhimavaśīrṇabhavanasārāṃ dhātryā pradarśyamānāṃ kācana viralabhūṣaṇāṃ kumārīṃ dadarśa /

GK19dandkc_u:2578: sakṛdvibhaktaścaturasraḥ kakundaravibhāgaśobhī rathāṅgākārasaṃsthitaśca nitambabhāgaḥ tanutaramīṣannimnaṃ gambīraṃ nābhimaṇḍalam,

GK19dandkc_u:2591: anatibhaṅguro bahulaḥ paryante 'pyakapilarucirāyāmavānekaikanisargasamasnigdhanīlo gandhagrāhī ca mūrdhajakalāpaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2595: avimṛśyakāriṇāṃ hi niyatamanekāḥ patantyanuśayaparamparāḥ' iti snigdhadṛṣṭirācaṣṭa-“bhadre,
GK19dandkc_u:2598: tasya hastātprasthamātraṃ dhānyamādāya kvacidalindoddeśe susiktasaṃmṛṣṭe dattapādaśaucamupāveśayat /
GK19dandkc_u:2599: sākanyā tān gandhaśālīnsaṃkṣudya mātrayā viśoṣyātape muhurmuhuḥ parivartya sthirasamāyā bhūmau nālīpṛṣṭena mṛdumṛdu ghaṭṭayantī tuṣairakhaṇḍaistaṇḍulānpṛthakcakāra
GK19dandkc_u:2604: tebhya imāndattvā labdhābhiḥ kākiṇībhiḥ sthiratarāṇyanatyārdrāṇi nātiśuṣkāṇi kāṣṭhāni mitaṃpacāṃ sthālīmubhe śarāve cāhara' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2606: samaśarīreṇa vibhāvyamānamadhyatānavena vyāyatena guruṇā khādireṇa musalena caturalalitakṣepapaṇotkṣepaṇāyāsitabhujamasakṛdaṅgulībhiruddhṛtyoddhṛtyāvahatya
GK19dandkc_u:2609: praślathāvayaveṣu prasphuratsu taṇḍuleṣu mukulāvasthāmativaratamāneṣu saṃkṣipyānalamupahitamukhapidhānayā sthālyānnamaṇḍamagālayat /
GK19dandkc_u:2610: darvyā cāvaghaṭya mātrayā parivartya samapakveṣu siktheṣu tāṃ sthālīmadhomukhīmavātiṣṭhipat /
GK19dandkc_u:2611: indhanānyantaḥsārāṇyambhasā samabhyukṣya praśamitāgnīni kṛṣṇāṅgārīkṛtya tadarthibhyaḥ prāhiṇot /
GK19dandkc_u:2612: “ebhirlabdhāḥ kākiṇīrdattvā śākaṃ dhṛtaṃ dadhi tailamāmakalaṃ ciñcāphalaṃ ca yathālābhamānaya' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2613: tathānuṣṭhite ca tayā dvitrānupadaṃśānupapādya tadannamaṇḍamārdra vālukopahitanavaśarāvagatamiti
GK19dandkc_u:2614: mṛdunā tālavṛntānilena śītalīkṛtya salavaṇasaṃbhāraṃ dattāṅgāradhūpavāsaṃ ca saṃpādya,
GK19dandkc_u:2615: tadapyāmalakaṃ ślakṣṇapiṣṭamutpalagandhi kṛtvā dhātrīmukhena snānāya tamacodayat /

GK19dandkc_u:2629: vṛddhayā tu taducchiṣṭamapohya haritagomayopalipte kuṭṭime svamevottarīyakarpaṭaṃ vyavadhāya kṣaṇamaśeta /
GK19dandkc_u:2636: tadguṇavaśīkṛtaśca bhartā sarvameva kuṭumbaṃ tadāyattameva kṛtvā tadekādhīnajīvitaśarīrastrivargaṃ nirvaveśa /
GK19dandkc_u:2638: tatastenānuyukto nimbavatavṛttamākhyātavān-“asti saurāṣṭreṣu valabhī nāma nagarī /

GK19dandkc_u:2640: tāṃ kila madhumatyāḥ samupāgamya balabhadro nāma sārthavāhaputraḥ paryaṇaiṣīt /
GK19dandkc_u:2641: tayāpi navavadhvā rahasi rabhasavighnitasuratasukho jhaṭiti dveṣamalpetaraṃ babandha /

GK19dandkc_u:2646: gate ca kasmiṃścitkālāntare sā tvanutapyamānā “kā me gatiḥ' iti vimṛśantī kāmapi vṛddhapravrājikāṃ mātṛsthānīyāṃ devaśeṣakusumairupasthitāmapaśyat
GK19dandkc_u:2648: tayāpyaśrumukhyā bahuprakāramanunīya ruditakāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭā trapamāṇāpi kāryagauravātkathaṃvivravīt-“amba,
GK19dandkc_u:2655: āvirāmācca me rahasyaṃ nāśrāvyam' iti pādayoḥ papāta /

GK19dandkc_u:2669: astyasmatprātiveśyo vaṇigabhijanena vibhavena rājāntaraṅgabhāvena ca sarvapaurānatītya vartate /

GK19dandkc_u:2675: taveyaṃ bhāryāsakhī nidhipatidattasya sarvaśreṣṭhimukhyasya kanyā kanakavatī nāma /
GK19dandkc_u:2678: sa tathokto niyatamunmukhībhūya tāmeva priyasakhīṃ manyamāno māṃ baddhāñjali yācamānāyai mahyaṃ bhūyastvatprārthitaḥ sābhilāṣamarpayiṣyati /
GK19dandkc_u:2679: “tena randhreṇopaśliṣya rāgamujjvalīkṛtya yathāsā kṛtasaṅketo deśāntaramādāya māṃ gamiṣyati tathopapādanīyam' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2681: athaitāṃ kanakavatīti vṛddhatāpasīvipralabdho balabhadraḥ saratnasārābharaṇāmādāya niśi nīrandhre tamasi prāvasat /
GK19dandkc_u:2682: sā tu tāpasī vārtāmāpādayat-“mandena mayā nirnimittamupekṣitā ratnavatī,
GK19dandkc_u:2685: tadatraiva saṃsṛṣṭo jivituṃ jihnemīti balabhadraḥ pūrvedyurmāmakathayat /
GK19dandkc_u:2688: ratnavatī tu mārge kāñcitpaṇyadāsīṃ saṃgṛhya tayohyamānapātheyādyupaskarā khaṭakapuramagamat /
GK19dandkc_u:2689: amutra ca vyavahārakuśalo balabhadraḥ svalpenaiva mūlena mahadvanamupārjayat /
GK19dandkc_u:2696: tacchutvā lubdhena tu daṇḍavāhinā pauravṛddhasaṃnidhau nidhipatidattasya kanyāṃ kanakavatīṃ moṣeṇāpahṛtyāsmatpure nivasatyeṣa durmatirbalabhadraḥ
GK19dandkc_u:2697: tasya sarvasvaharaṇaṃ na bhavadbhiḥ pratibandhanīyam' iti nitarāmabhartsyata /
GK19dandkc_u:2700: balabhyāmeva gṛhagupataduhitā ratnavatī nāmeyaṃ dattā pitṛbhyāṃ mayā ca nyāyoḍhā /
GK19dandkc_u:2701: na cetpratītha praṇidhiṃ prahiṇutāsyā bandhupārśavam' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2702: balabhadrastu tathoktvā śreṇīprātibhāvyena tāvadavātiṣṭhata yāvattatpuravṛddhalekhyalabdhavṛttānto gṛhaguptaḥ kheṭakapuramāgatya saha jāmātrā duhitaramatiprītaḥ pratyanaiṣīt /
GK19dandkc_u:2703: tathā dṛṣṭvā ratnavatīṃ kanakavatīti bhāvayatastasyaiva balabhadrasyātivallabhā jātā /
GK19dandkc_u:2707: tatra kaścitkulaputraḥ kalāsu gaṇikāsu cātiraktaḥ mitrārthaṃ svabhujamātranirvyūḍhānekakalahaḥ,
GK19dandkc_u:2709: sa caikadā kasyacidāgantościtrakarasya haste citrapaṭaṃ dadarśa /
GK19dandkc_u:2710: tatra kācidalekhyagatā yuvatirālokamātreṇaiva kalahakaṇṭhakasya kāmāturaṃ cetaścakāra /
GK19dandkc_u:2720: tadiyaṃ vṛddhasya kasyacidvaṇijo nātipuṃstvasya yathārhasaṃbhogālābhapīḍitā gṛhiṇī tvayātikauśalādyathādṛṣṭamālikhitā bhavitumarhati' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2722: avantipuryāmujjayinyāmanantakīrtināmnaḥ sārthavāhasya bhāryā yathārthanāmā nitambavatī nāmaiṣā saundaryavismitena mayaivamālikhitā' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2724: bhārgavo nāma bhūtvā bhikṣānibhena tadgṛhaṃ praviśya tāṃ dadarśa /
GK19dandkc_u:2727: tatra labdhaiśca śavāvaguṇṭhanapaṭādibhiḥ kāmapyarhantikāṃ nāma śramaṇikāmupāsāṃcakre /
GK19dandkc_u:2730: śramaṇikāmukhācca duṣkaraśīlabhraṃśāṃ kulastriyamupalabhya rahasi dūtikāmaśikṣayat-“bhūyo 'pyupatiṣṭha sārvāhabhāryām /
GK19dandkc_u:2731: brūhi copahvare saṃsāradoṣadarśanātsamādhimāsthāya mumukṣamāṇo mādṛśo janaḥ kulavadhūnāṃ śīlapātane ghaṭata iti kva ghaṭate /
GK19dandkc_u:2732: etadapi tvāmaṣyudārayā samṛddhyā rūpeṇātimānuṣeṇa prathamena vayasopapannāṃ kimitaranārīsulabhaṃ cāpala spṛṣṭaṃ na veti parīkṣā kṛtā /
GK19dandkc_u:2735: bhartā tu bhavatyāḥ kenacidgraheṇādhiṣṭhitaḥ pāṇḍurogadurbalo bhoge cāsamarthaḥ sthito 'bhūt /
GK19dandkc_u:2738: vṛkṣavāṭikāmekākinī praviśya madupanītasya kasyācinmantravādinaśchannameva haste caraṇamarpayitvā tadabhimantritena praṇayukupitā nāma bhūtvā bhartāramurasi prahartumarhasi /
GK19dandkc_u:2742: sā tathoktā vyaktamabhyupaiṣyati naktaṃ māṃ vṛkṣavāṭikāṃ praveśya tāmapi praveśayiṣyasi tāvataiva tvayāhamanugṛhīto bhaveyam' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:2744: so 'tiprītastasyāmeva kṣapāyāṃ vṛkṣavāṭikāyāṃ gato nitambavatīṃ nirgranthikāprayatnenopanītāṃ
GK19dandkc_u:2745: pāda parāmṛśanniva hemanūpuramekamākṣipya churikayorumūle kiñcidālikhya drutataramapāsarat /
GK19dandkc_u:2746: sā tu sāndratrāsā svameva durṇayaṃ garhamāṇā jidhāṃsantīva śramaṇikāṃ tadvraṇaṃ bhavanadīrghikāyāṃ
GK19dandkc_u:2747: prakṣālya dattvā paṭabandhanamāmayāpadeśādaparaṃ cāpanīya nūpuraṃ śayanaparā tricaturāṇi
GK19dandkc_u:2749: sa dhūrtaḥ “nikreṣye' iti tena nūpureṇa tamanantakīrtimupāsasada /
GK19dandkc_u:2750: sa dṛṣṭvā ” mama gṛhiṇyā evaiṣa nūpuraḥ,
GK19dandkc_u:2754: sa ca salajjaṃ sasādhvasaṃ cādya rātrau viśrāmapraviṣṭāyāṃ vṛkṣavāṭikāyāṃ prabhraṣṭo mamaikaḥ praśithilabandho nūpuraḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:2755: so 'dyāpyanviṣṭo na dṛṣṭaḥ sa punarayaṃ dvitīya ityaparaṃ prāhiṇot /
GK19dandkc_u:2756: anayā ca vārtayāmuṃ puraskṛtya sa vaṇik vaṇigjanasamājamājagāma /
GK19dandkc_u:2757: sa cānuyukto dhūrtaḥ savinayamāvedayat--“viditameva khalu vaḥ,
GK19dandkc_u:2759: lubdhāśca kadācinmaddarśanabhīravo niśi daheyurapi śavānīti niśāsvapiśmaśānamadhiśaye /
GK19dandkc_u:2760: aparedyurdagdhādagdhaṃ mṛtakaṃ citāyāḥ prasabhamākarṣantī śyāmākārāṃ nārīmapaśyam /
GK19dandkc_u:2761: arthalobhāttu nigṛhya sādhvasaṃ sā gṛhītā śastrikayorumūle yadṛcchayā kiñcidullikhitam /

GK19dandkc_u:3542: tatra rājavāhanaṃ śivapūjārthaṃniśi śivālaye sthitaṃ prātaranupalabhyāvaśiṣṭāḥ sarve
GK19dandkc_u:3543: 'pi kumārāḥ “sahaiva rājavāhanena rājahaṃsaṃ praṇaṃsyāmo na cetprāṇāṃstyakṣyāmaḥ'
GK19dandkc_u:3544: iti pratijñāya sainyaṃ parāvartya rājavāhanamanveṣṭaṃ pṛthakprasthitāḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3547: vidhāya prāṇaparityāyaṃ kurvaḥ' iti niścitya tadāśramamupagatau taṃ muniṃ praṇamya
GK19dandkc_u:3548: yāvatsthitau tāvadeva tena trikālavedinā muninā viditamevāsmanmanīṣitam /
GK19dandkc_u:3552: vikrameṇa vihitadigvijayāḥ prabhūtāni rājyānyupalabhya ṣoḍhaśābdānte vijayinaṃ rājavāhanaṃ
GK19dandkc_u:3553: puraskṛtya pratyetya tava vasumatyāśca pādānabhivādya bhavadājñāvidhāyino bhaviṣyanti /
GK19dandkc_u:3554: atastannimittaṃ kimapi sāhasaṃ na vidheyam' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:3557: tvaduktāvadhiḥ pūrṇaprāyo bhavati tatpravṛttistvayādyāpi vijñāyate' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:3559: rājavāhanapramukhāḥ sarve 'pi kumārā anekāndurjayāñśatrūnvijitya digvijayaṃ vidhāya bhūvalayaṃ vaśīkṛtya campāyāmekatra sthitāḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3560: tavājñāpatramādāya tadānayanāya preṣyantāṃ śīghrameva sevakāḥ' iti munivacanamākarṇya bhavadākāraṇāyājñāpatraṃ preṣitamasti /
GK19dandkc_u:3561: ataḥparaṃ cetkṣaṇamapi yūyaṃ vilambaṃ vidhāsyatha tato māṃ vasumatīṃ ca mātaraṃ kathāvaśeṣāveva śroṣyatheti jñātvā pānīyamapi pathi bhūtvā peyam' iti /
GK19dandkc_u:3562: evaṃ piturājñāpatraṃ mūrdhni vidhṛtya gacchemeti niścayaṃ cakruḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3564: niyujya kiyatā sainyaina mārgarakṣāṃ vidhāya pūrvavariṇaṃ mālaveśaṃ mānasāra parājatya
GK19dandkc_u:3565: tadapi rājyaṃ vaśīkṛtya puṣpapure rājño rājahaṃsasya devyā vasumatyāśca pādānnamasyāmaḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3566: evaṃ niścitya svasvabhāryāsaṃyutāḥ parimitena sainyana mālaveśaṃ prati prasthitāḥ /
GK19dandkc_u:3567: prāpya cojjayinīṃ tadaiva sahāyabhūtaistaiḥ kumāraiḥ parimitena rājavāhanenātibalavānapi mālaveśo mānasāraḥ kṣaṇena parājigye nihataśca /
GK19dandkc_u:3568: tatastaddahitaramavantisundarīṃ samādāya caṇjavarmaṇā tanmantriṇā pūrvaṃ kārāgṛhe
GK19dandkc_u:3569: rakṣitaṃ puṣpodbhavaṃ kumāraṃ sakuṭumbaṃ tata unmocitaṃ saha nītvā mālavendrarājyaṃ
GK19dandkc_u:3571: kumārāḥ puṣpapuraṃ sametya rājavāhanaṃ puraskṛtya tasya rājahaṃsasya māturvasumatyāśca
GK19dandkc_u:3575: samakṣaṃ vāmadevo rājavāhanapramukhānāṃ daśānāmapi kumārāṇāmabhilāṣaṃ vijñāya tānājñāpayat--bhavantaḥ sarve 'pyekavāraṃ gatvā svāni svāni rājyāni nyāyena paripālayantu /
GK19dandkc_u:3577: tataste sarve 'pi kumārāstanmunivacanaṃ śiramyādhāyā taṃ praṇamya pitarau ca,
GK19dandkc_u:3578: gatvā digvijayaṃ vidhāya pratyāgamanāntaṃ svasvavṛttaṃ pṛthakpṛthaḍmunisamakṣaṃ nyavedayan /
GK19dandkc_u:3579: pitarau ca kumārāṇāṃ nijaparākramāvabodhakānyatidurghaṭāni caritānyākarṇya paramānandamāpnutām /
GK19dandkc_u:3582: ataḥparaṃ mama svābhicaraṇasaṃnidhau vānaprasthāśramamau tyātmasādhanameva vidhātumucitam /
GK19dandkc_u:3584: kumārebhyo yathocitaṃ sampradāya te kumārā rājavāhanājñābidhāyinastadekamatyā vartamānāścaturudadhimekhalāṃ
GK19dandkc_u:3585: vasuṃdharāṃ samuddhṛtya kaṇṭakānupabhuñjanti tathā vidheyaṃ svāminā iti /
GK19dandkc_u:3587: ayaṃ yuṣmajjanaka etadvayaḥsamucite pathi varmānaḥ kāyakleśaṃ vinava madāśramastho vānapraśthāśramāśrayaṇaṃ sarvathā bhavaddharni nivāraṇīyaḥ
GK19dandkc_u:3589: bhavantaśca pitṛsaṃnidhau na sukhamavāpsthanti' iti maharṣerājñāmadhigamya te piturvānaprasthāśramādhigamapratiṣedhāgrahamatyajan /
GK19dandkc_u:3590: rājavāhanaṃ puṣpapure 'vasthāpya tadanujñayā sarve 'pi parijanāḥ svāni svāni rājyāni pratipālya svecchayā pitro samīpa gatāgatamakurvan /
GK19dandkc_u:3591: evamavasthitāste rājavāhanapramukhāḥ sarve 'pi kumārā rājavāhanājñayā sarvamapi vasudhāvalayaṃ
